sentences.english: The pain may also be felt beneath the precordium.
sentences.chinese: 也可在胸前区下方有疼痛感觉。

sentences.english: We used a submaximal effort tourniquet test to induce ischemic pain.
sentences.chinese: 我们使用了亚努力止血带试验诱发缺血性疼痛。

sentences.english: Her pains are mostly pure imagination.
sentences.chinese: 她的疼痛多半是纯粹想像出来的东西。

sentences.english: Acupuncture may cause just a little pain, but it also causes a certain feeling of numbness and distension.
sentences.chinese: 针刺只有轻微疼痛，它产生一定的麻和胀感。
我的脚已经麻了，感觉不到任何疼痛。

sentences.english: Indeed, pain and itch have been difficult to separate.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，疼痛和瘙痒一直以来都很难分开。

sentences.english: Common side effects from these drugs include muscle pain and soreness.
sentences.chinese: 这些药物常见的副作用包括肌肉疼痛和酸痛。
桂皮可以减轻关节疼痛。

sentences.english: He took some anodyne to relieve the pain.
sentences.chinese: 他吃了些止痛药来缓解疼痛。

sentences.english: The pain had become constant in the last two months and was associated with diarrhea and tenesmus.
sentences.chinese: 近二个月有持续疼痛的情形，且合并腹泻及裹急后重。

sentences.english: To drown my heart in the tender pain and sweet happiness.
sentences.chinese: 让自己的心有了柔柔的疼痛和幸福的甜蜜。

sentences.english: Do not use when abdominal pain, nausea or vomiting are present.
sentences.chinese: 当腹部感到疼痛时，恶心，呕吐时请勿使用。
出院后随访无疼痛再发。

sentences.english: Huge rash can cause local foreign body sensation or because of friction and cause pain.
sentences.chinese: 巨大皮疹可引起局部异物感或因摩擦而引起疼痛。

sentences.english: My instep arch not only keeps the ache.
sentences.chinese: 我拱起的脚背仍疼痛著。

sentences.english: It kind of short-circuits the pain.
sentences.chinese: 这种药膏可以稍微缩短疼痛的时间。

definition: to sneak in/to infiltrate/to be piercingly painful/to be unbearable (of pain, itch etc)
sharp pain/cramp/griping pain/colic/angina, cf 心絞痛|心绞痛
